name: Slime Chime
description:
You heard them singing before. Do you remember?

Slime Chime is a stunning 2.5D platformer in which you take control of little slimies helping out each other. However, this is not all.  Every slime has a unique sound. Before each level, you'll hear them singing together. Your objective is to remember the melody, gather every slime, and make them sing in proper sequence so that 'It does sound like me them' 

  • WASD to move
  • E to switch slime ball
  • F to sing
  • R to restart the level

Created for the BYOG game jam 2022.
